channel.title: Help with respawning
channel.description: Alright, well I am creating a server, and when I died I get respawned away from home. I did ::mypos when I respawned and search for the coords in client.java. I changed them all to the coords I want to spawn at and it still is spawning me in the same spot. Is there anything Im missing lol? Thanks.

item.title: Help with respawning
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Bumpâ€¦

This is what my code is. if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { toX = 3087; toY = 3513; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); pkPoints -= 50; resetOtherAtk(); if (destruct) { absX = 3087; absY = 3513; }
And I still spawn at the old location.

item.title: Help with respawning
item.dc:creator: @kidd619 kidd619
item.description:
@kidd619 wrote:

client.java

removeAllItems(); teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = XXXX; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
XXXX = to what ever you your respawn point to be.

i believe that is correct
